name: Retro Fizzy Bath Bombs
description:
Retro Fizzy Bath Bombs for your soaking pleasure.

	Made in small batches with all natural dry ingredients, jojoba oil, and fragrance/essential oil.

	Sure to relax your body and mind.

	Comes in the following scents:
Lavender
English Rose
Plumeria
Honeysuckle
White Tea & Ginger
Island Coconut
Green Tea 
Eucalyptus Spearmint
Arabian Spice
Relaxing
Sandalwood Vanilla
Coconut Lime Verbena
Vanilla
Watermelon
Tangerine
Apple

	The listing is for one 4oz bath bomb and if you would like more than one, please email me at fizzyhabit@cox.net

	Be good to yourself!
Mahalo!

name: Four Fabulous Bombs
description:
(4) 4 ounce Fizzy Bath Bombs in your choice of scents below.
This is a great way to try out different scents in these
fizzy bath bombs. Free sample with each order!

	Deliciously scented and fun fizzies for your soaking pleasure. These bombs will soften your hardwater and release skin-loving moisture for your bath.

	All natural ingredients are used in this product 
and made to order in small batches.  This set will be gift-boxed for giving or to give to thyself.

	These fizzy bombs come in the following scents:

	Lavender
English Rose
Plumeria
Honeysuckle
White Tea & Ginger
Island Coconut
Green Tea 
Eucalyptus Spearmint
Arabian Spice
Relaxing
Sandalwood Vanilla
Coconut Lime Verbena
Vanilla
Watermelon
Tangerine
Apple

	For international orders, please email me(fizzyhabit@cox.net) for accurate ship cost.

	Be good to yourself!
Mahalo!

name: Heart Shaped Bombs
description:
These 6oz fizzy heart bombs are sure to give more pleasure than a dozen roses and less guilt after eating a pound of candy!

	Always handmade with all natural dry ingredients, fragrance&essential oils, and jojoba oil.

	Comes in the following scents:
Lavender
English Rose
Plumeria
Honeysuckle
White Tea & Ginger
Island Coconut
Green Tea 
Eucalyptus Spearmint
Arabian Spice
Relaxing
Sandalwood Vanilla
Coconut Lime Verbena
Vanilla
Watermelon
Tangerine
Apple

	This listing is for 4 heart bombs, gift-packaged as shown in my pics. If you would like to order more than one, please email me at fizzyhabit@cox.net

	For international orders, please convo me for accurate ship cost.

	Be good to yourself!
Mahalo!

name: Lavender Bath Bomb
description: (1) Huge Fizzy Bath Bomb in Lavender. This Lavender smells just like dried buds rolled in my palms or fingers, it’s so authentic. EIGHT OUNCES of goodness! Size of a tennis ball(80mm)! This bomb can be split in half to be used for 2 baths :) Free sample with every order! Deliciously scented and fun fizzy for your soaking pleasure. All natural ingredients are used in this product and made to order. This fizzy bomb also comes in the following scents: Lavender English Rose Plumeria Honeysuckle White Tea & Ginger Island Coconut Green Tea Eucalyptus Spearmint Arabian Spice Relaxing Sandalwood Vanilla Coconut Lime Verbena Vanilla Watermelon Tangerine Apple For international orders, please email me(fizzyhabit@cox.net) for accurate ship cost. Mahalo!
